summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Village Friends homeschool family connection app. Backend APIs are 100% functional, frontend core flows working with one minor JavaScript error in dashboard.

ui_bugs.issue: JavaScript error: 'eventsRes.data.hosted is not iterable' when fetching dashboard data
ui_bugs.details: The dashboard expects events API response to have 'hosted' and 'attending' arrays, but API might be returning different structure

passed_tests: Landing page loads with proper branding and all elements
User registration creates account with 14-day trial
User login with email/password works correctly
Google OAuth button redirects to auth.emergentagent.com
Pricing page displays monthly ($9.99) and annual ($89.99) plans
Protected routes redirect to login when not authenticated
All 13 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
API Root endpoint returns correct Village Friends API message
User registration API creates user with trial status
User login API returns token and user data
Family profile creation and retrieval working
Event creation and listing APIs working
Subscription plans API returns correct pricing
Messages, meetup requests, and calendar APIs working
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dashboard JavaScript error where events API response structure doesn't match frontend expectations. The dashboard component expects 'eventsRes.data.hosted' and 'eventsRes.data.attending' arrays but API might be returning different format.
